page.title: 15A DAY IN JOANNE'S LIFE
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JOANNE BATEMAN Every morning from Monday to Friday I get up at around 7.40am.I go downstairs and have a cup of tea with my family.My dad calls me for breakfast.Usually I have one egg with toast and a drink of Vimto.At 8.55am I set off for school.When I get there I am just in time for registration. Today is Friday we did English Grammar and maths.We learnt how to do Venn Diagrams. At 12.00 it is dinner time.I have a packed lunch of sandwiches, cheese,a biscuit and a drink.At 12.30 till 1.15 we have a dinner break. At 3.15pm all the school meets in the hall with the headmaster.At 3.45pm I collect my little sister and we go home. I practise on my flute and violin then go out to play.
